message.body: can i talk to you if i call you real fast? are you busy?
Yea you can call
okay give me ten mins let me get away from everyone
K
i was in psychology class and he was goinf over disorders and i know what i have !!!! im so happyyyy, like he was tellig me all stifff
stuff*
Lol what do you have?
hold up im about to tell you!!!
i have generalized anxiety , dysthymic depression, manic mood and i have cyclothymic disorder
Ok.. honestly just because you have symptoms for these it does not mean you have them 100%... is there a possibility you have them? Yes... is it definite? No
To start, cyclothymia is s mild form of bipolar... do you feel completely depressed one minute but then extremely hapoy the next minute?
yeaaa ur rightt , ! but i do think im depressed , do you?
Plus these disorders run in the family. .. if your parents, siblings, other relatives don't have them then you don't either...
But yes I can agree with you that have a form of depression. I wouldn't start labeling it with a "disorder" tho without knowing for sure
no i dont think i have any of the things i said but i have symptoms of it . i think i have a case of depression but not serious because i can still function and
stuff i just have my ups and doens
but like you said i dont know if its a disorder but i have symptoms of it
and dont tell anyone ! im trusting you ! ur like my personal psychologist

Right... like a lot if people have... you'll learn that depression can be more common than you think. Everyone experiences depression at some point. Some more often then others, some more serious than others
Lmao I won't tell anyone!!!
yes! ur right ! but if it starts to get worse then i can talk to my doctor ! i told my mom yesterday and she said i can talk to my doctor if i want i just cant
talk to a psychologist because it will be on my record for life like you sai
yea my mom said that would ruin my chance of becoming a psychologist and my criminal justice field
Like I said you also have school counselors, they are there for situations like this. And I'm here anytime to talk
Yu
Yup*
okay good ! thank youu!! once i start getting use to this college i think ill be fine
Yea its a huge change but you'll adjust eventually
